projects.title: Corporate Reputation or Corporate Branding on SMEs Financial Performance
projects.description: Analysed various financial models of researches conducted and done the literature review of 9 research articles to find the relationship between corporate reputation and financial performance of small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs).Made concluding insights for Brand Identity Development, Internal Branding, Brand Performance, Brand Orientation, Brand Awareness, Brand Credibility and Brand Communication in relation with Financial Performance.
